___name.description: The name of the alert rule.

___frequency.description: The alert rule frequency in ISO8601 format. The time granularity must be in minutes and minimum value is 5 minutes.

___throttling.description: Optional throttling information for the alert rule.

___detector.description: The detector information. By default this is not populated, unless it's specified in expandDetector

___actionGroups.description: The Action Groups information, used by the alert rule.
